location: Wanlong Street, near Lingang MRT Station (320m)
notes: Full-floor 2BR/2BA unit in 13-story elevator building with rare terrace. Move-in ready with appliances included. Pet-friendly and cooking allowed. For baby safety, the terrace/balcony railings should be inspected. Being on 2F with elevator access is convenient for strollers. Cannot confirm modernity without interior photos.
